channel.title: Compiler Help
channel.description:
1. code: @echo off title Galkons Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
error: "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java is not recognized as and internal or external command
2. code: @echo off title Galkons Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
error system cannot find path specified
Please help and Thank You

item.title: Compiler Help
item.dc:creator: @Madraiyah Madraiyah
item.description:
@Madraiyah wrote:

Its either the jre and jdk problem or javac (when i go in folder i dont see a javac…)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 13, 2008, 03:07:29 PM[/size][hr]Oh the problem is (because i looked at the guide) when i type javac in CMD it doesnt work it says ‘javac’ is not recognized as a internal or external command

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Help
item.dc:creator: @sickedank sickedank
item.description:
@sickedank wrote:

you either specified the wrong type of jdk, or you dont even have it. Use your common sense.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Help
item.dc:creator: @Madraiyah Madraiyah
item.description:
@Madraiyah wrote:

  1. code:
    @echo off
    title Galkons Compiler
    “C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
    pause

error:
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java is not recognized as and internal or external command

  1. code:
    @echo off
    title Galkons Compiler
    “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
    pause

error
system cannot find path specified

Please help and Thank You
